description: Adds a tag to a resource.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the tags.

parameters.name: ResourceTags
parameters.description: Adds a tag to a resource. (dict) --- The tag structure that contains a tag key and value. The object key of your of your resource tag. The specific value of the resource tag.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The object key of your of your resource tag.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The specific value of the resource tag.
